title: Your First Steps — Orientation Checklist
intro: Before we dive into the technical learning, let's make sure you're set up and ready. Complete these quick steps to start strong.
estTime: Estimated time: ~1 day (within your first working day).

verifyDevice.label: Verify your computer access (OS login, VPN, company Wi-Fi).
verifyDevice.help: If something doesn't work, open a support ticket from the footer.

emailCalendar.label: Access your company email and calendar.
emailCalendar.help: Sign in, set your signature, and check the onboarding events already scheduled.

taskTool.label: Join the team's task management tool (e.g., Jira / Monday) and view your onboarding board.
taskTool.help: You'll receive read access; tasks for Week 1 are already prepared.

hrSession.label: Attend the HR orientation session.
hrSession.help: Review benefits, policies, and security guidelines.

campusTour.label: Take an office/campus tour (if applicable) and locate your team's area.
campusTour.help: Say hi to your team members and meet your manager.

meetBuddy.label: Meet your TL and say hello to Buddy (our AI mentor).
meetBuddy.help: You can ask Buddy anything during the journey.

buddyNudge: — your smart mentor is here for you anytime.
ctaComplete: All set — Move to Technical Orientation →
